body: Figures on the share of seats held by women in national assemblies around the world show that Latin America, "ranks second only to Nordic Europe in terms of the percentage of women elected to parliamentary-level," as Mike explains in Central American Politics. He also looks specifically at women's participation in Guatemalan politics.
original_body: Figures on the share of seats held by women in national assemblies around the world show that Latin America, "ranks second only to Nordic Europe in terms of the percentage of women elected to parliamentary-level," as Mike explains in Central American Politics. He also looks specifically at women's participation in Guatemalan politics.
title: Latin America: Women's Political Participation in the Region
